summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to the Seattle and Montana Railroad Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, by Ordinance no. 9117, as amended by Ordinance No. 12191, amending the latter ordinance to provide for changes in the franchise right of way occasioned by the construction and maintenance of the Alaskan Way Viaduct; specifically amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 12191, with a view to providing for such changes; and providing for the acceptance by the Great Northern Railway Company, successor in interest to the Seattle and Montana Railroad Company, of said franchise as so modified.
